Translation: Our camp was that place,

Father said to us "I'll go hunting".
It was on Sunday. Father set off to go hunting.
He went across the river to Kuf.
Some young girls were living there,
bush girls.
As father departed,
he began hunting for pigs with his dogs.
The dogs started barking (at the pigs).
This was a clear place without trees,
only dödö bushes.
Thsh dödö which we use as a broom.
Only those bushes were there.
